name: oneshot (itch) (half-bit software)
description:
Created for the simplejam

Rules

  • you only get one shot
  • you can pick up another shot
  • killing an enemy earns you a point
  • dying takes away a point
  • you can move and jump lots

Controls

  • P1: arrow keys, comma to shoot
  • P2: WADS, Q to shoot

The background changes color based on whoever's winning. As with life, the game never really ends.

Attributions:

  • Pew pew laser sound effect made by Juhani Junkala!
  • Sprite pack done by Oryx: http://oryxdesignlab.com/product-sprites/lo-fi-sci...
  • Happily made using luxe engine
